msgSnippet: I m worried about my own stupidity.  I have no doubt that any evil programmer worth his/her salt would just replace my junit.jar to do whatever they wanted.

I'm worried about my own stupidity.  I have no doubt that any evil
programmer worth his/her salt would just replace my junit.jar to
do whatever they wanted.

> -----Original Message-----
> From: kentbeck@... [mailto:kentbeck@...]
> Sent: Friday, July 27, 2001 11:12 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] Re: re - assert counting
> 
> 
> Are folks worried about accidentally leaving asserts out of methods, 
> or about evil programmers boosting their test count by writing bogus 
> tests?
> 
> Kent
subject: RE: [junit] Re: re - assert counting
